text: Miru ekkadunna sare! Miku cavu vacci tirutundi mariyu miru goppa kota burujulalo unna cavu raka tappadu." (Ani paluku). Mariyu variki emaina melu kaligite: "Idi allah taraphu nundi vaccindi." Ani antaru. Kani varikedaina kidu galigite: "(O muham'mad!) Idi ni valla jarigindi." Ani antaru. Varito anu: "Anta allah taraphu nunde (vastundi)!" I janulaku emayindi? Varu e visayanni kuda enduku artham cesukoleka potunnaru
